Articles.Content:
I was wondering if I could get some help with running the nuclear engines. Some seem to run on liquid fuel and others (Mods) say Liquid Hydrogen, however the hydrogen ones don't seem to want to run for me when I make the tank a hydrogen one. I'm a bit confused on how to make them work. I'd appreciate any assistance with this issue.

Thank you,

E

> 
> I was wondering if I could get some help with running the nuclear engines. Some seem to run on liquid fuel and others (Mods) say Liquid Hydrogen, however the hydrogen ones don't seem to want to run for me when I make the tank a hydrogen one. I'm a bit confused on how to make them work. I'd appreciate any assistance with this issue.
> Thank you,
> 
> E

which mods are we talking about running on liquid hydrogen?
It could be Near Future since it has a patch to make the Nervs use LH

I think its Near Future or Atomic age, not sure. Ive added a few more than planned and now lost track of every mod I've injected into the system!!! When I activate the engine it shows that there's no fuel in the tank even though there's a full tank of LHydrogen. Also it says that that's what it runs off of in the description.

Thanks,

E

> 
> It could be Near Future since it has a patch to make the Nervs use LH[/quote
> i really think the engines came from Nearfuture. The engines say Wobbly Rockets. It's the Nerva MKI Nuclear engine. Can't get the thing to light at all and it says liquid hydrogen is its thing... Any ideas??
> 
> thanks,
> 
> E
